  • Method Details

    • writeCategory

      public void writeCategory() throws java.io.IOException
      WriteCategory opens a file and recursively writes the contents of the category to the category file. This should ONLY be used for the King Category!!!
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Exception thrown when FileWrite or PrintWrite encounters an error

    • writeCategoryHelper

      public void writeCategoryHelper() throws java.io.IOException
      WriteCategory opens a file and recursively writes the contents of the category to the category file. This should ONLY be initiated from the root of the King Category
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Exception thrown when FileWrite or PrintWrite encounters an error

    • makeCategories

      public static void makeCategories() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      WriteCategory opens a file and recursively writes the contents of the category file to the category. This should ONLY be initiated from the King Category
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Exception when file cannot be opened

    • readCategory

      public void readCategory​(java.lang.String txt)
      WriteCategory opens a file and recursively writes the contents of the category file to the category. This should ONLY be initiated from the root of the King Category
      Parameters:
      txt - - a string that contains the information for the category and all subcategories
